overview: "Me" is a is a teenager in the body of an adult, a simple being of spirit. He lives and works at his mother's restaurant; "Me" loves his mom and he is loved by everyone, especially Elena, her friend of 11 years. "Me" detests Pady,  the man who sleeps with his mother. Sometimes, "Me" sees shadows on people and he knows that means they are going to die.
title: Yo
